observationTitle: Phagocytic function - Leukocyte adhesion defect, and myeloperoxidase deficiency
indicationText: Administer to persons who have a phagocytic function defect [e.g. leukocyte adhesion defect and myeloperoxidase deficiency].
contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has a phagocytic function defect [e.g. leukocyte adhesion defect and myeloperoxidase deficiency].
clarifyingText: Phagocytic deficiencies that are undefined or accompanied by defects in T-cell and NK cell dysfunction (such as a Chediak-Higashi syndrome, Leukocyte Adhesion Deficiency [LAD], and myeloperoxidase deficiency)
